alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Collier, southeastern Hendry and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge to 8 miles northwest of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation to near Hendry Correctional. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendry Correctional and Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
